name: Heaven's Sake Eternity Green
description:
This is Heaven's Sake Infinity Green. A third person game with 2 bosses. There are more bosses and monsters but we had to upload before the deadline. They will be in the game at a later date. This Game has a Big map beautiful art work and a lot of sword slashing. Also there are bugs out the wazu.

I Would like to give Thanks to>>

Meow098 :D

Darkchall :D

For all there help without them this game would not have gotten as far as it did.

:THE CONTROLS:

Keyboard Controls-

Movement - WASD UP,DOWN,LEFT,RIGHT ARROWS

Charge Energy - HOLD LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

Sword Attack - RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON

Jump - SPACE BAR

Xbox One Controller Controlls

Movement -  LEFT AXIS STICK

Jump -  A BUTTON

Attack - X BUTTON

Charge Jump and attack Energy - B BUTTON
